gcci.text: H100 supply normalizes as domestic fabs lift yields, easing lead times and stabilizing capex planning.

gtpi.text: API price wars compress token costs as distilled, efficient models undercut incumbents.

gagl.text: Grid load rises toward 150 TWh annually, pushing new nuclear baseload and demand response to stabilize carbon intensity.

aipi.text: Funding rotation and unit-economics scrutiny suggest a maturing cycle with selective growth and lower bubble risk.
